poem:
Title: "Cherry Picker's Testament"

In the don of reflective vest,
Hofman waltz o'er the laws' nest.
High in the hydraulic pulley's grace,
Spectral under a moonless place.
He sees what others scarcely see,
His lens makes known what's ought to be.
Heroes captured in the sheen of strife,
He paints a playground of life.
